In 2023, I lost my maternal grandmother 18 days before my birthday. I was already a big fan of Bruno, but I didn't listen to It Will Rain much. On the day of the wake, I was devastated, lost, it seemed that from the moment I lost her, everything became darkness. I was in the garage, browsing TikTok, and suddenly a video of this song appeared, and from that moment on, Bruno Mars became my comfort singer. I ended up falling into depression, but Bruno's songs helped me overcome this pain... In September I will turn 15 and I will pay tribute to my dear grandmother, exactly with this song, the song that appeared on the day she was hospitalized and she passed away, this song could have a sad meaning for me, but it gave me the strength to continue.
